sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"结束，完成"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: complete, finish, end, close, conclude, terminate, accomplish
means: complete ： 侧重指完成预定的任务或使某事完善，补足缺少的部分等。
finish ： 与complete基本同义，着重圆满地结束或完成已着手的事。
end ： 最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
close ： 普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。
conclude ： 正式用词，多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
terminate ： 强调有一个空间和时间的限度，届时必须终止。书面语用词。
accomplish ： 正式用词，强调一个过程的完成；也可指依靠努力达到一定目的，或取得一定的结果。

sentence.Network_en: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 经历一番痛苦挣扎后，她决定终止妊娠。

sentence.Network_en: This train will terminate at Taunton.
sentence.Network_cn: 这列火车的终点站是汤顿。

sentence.Network_en: You have no right to terminate the contract.

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly US)murder or assassinate someone (used as a euphemism)

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'direct an action towards a specified end'): from Latin terminat- 'limited, ended', from the verb terminare, from terminus 'end, boundary'

entry.def: When you terminate something or when it terminates, it ends completely.

example.ex: Her next remark abruptly terminated the conversation...
example.tran: 她接下来说的话使谈话戛然而止。

example.ex: His contract terminates at the end of the season.
example.tran: 他的合同在本赛季末终止。

entry.def: To terminate a pregnancy means to end it.

example.ex: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy...
example.tran: 经历一番痛苦挣扎后，她决定终止妊娠。

example.ex: In the world as a whole, about ten per cent of all pregnancies are terminated.
example.tran: 从全世界看来，所有怀孕的人中约 10% 的妊娠被终止了。

entry.def: When a train or bus terminates somewhere, it ends its journey there.

example.ex: This train will terminate at Taunton.
example.tran: 这列火车的终点站是汤顿。

means.word_mean: 1. bring to an end or halt;

sentences.sentence: "She ended their friendship when she found out that he had once been convicted of a crime"
"The attack on Poland terminated the relatively peaceful period after WWI"

means.word_mean: 2. have an end, in a temporal, spatial, or quantitative sense; either spatial or metaphorical;

sentences.sentence: "the bronchioles terminate in a capillary bed"
"Your rights stop where you infringe upon the rights of other"

means.word_mean: 3. be the end of; be the last or concluding part of;

auth_sentence.content: Photons simple ramp up faster and terminate much faster.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Photons simple ramp up faster and terminate much faster.

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结

sentences.en: You have no right to terminate the contract.

jushi.english: You have not right to terminate the contract.
Every summer a number of boys terminate their youthful career in a watery grave.
jushi.chinese: 每年夏天，都有若干名男孩子把年轻有为的一生埋葬在水中。
